title: Force on electron between two parallel plates

content.question: The force on an electron located on the 0-volt potential line is

choices.label: directed to the right, but its magnitude cannot be determined without knowing the distance between the lines
directed to the left, but its magnitude cannot be determined without knowing the distance between the lines

content.answer: directed to the right, but its magnitude cannot be determined without knowing the distance between the lines

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
